verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, Yet will I <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5061>plague<s%> more upon <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and upon <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; <S%H310>afterwards<s%> he will let you <S%H7971>go<s%> here when he shall let you <S%H7971>go<s%>, he shall <S%H1644>surely<s%> thrust you <S%H1644>out<s%> of here <S%H3617>altogether<s%>.

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> now in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and let every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7592>borrow<s%> of his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>, and every <S%H802>woman<s%> of her <S%H7468>neighbor<s%>, <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>. Moreover the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, About <S%H3915>midnight<s%> will I go <S%H3318>out<s%> into the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>:

And all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%>, from the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> that <S%H3427>sits<s%> upon his <S%H3678>throne<s%>, even unto the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of the <S%H8198>maidservant<s%> that is <S%H310>behind<s%> the <S%H7347>mill<s%>; and all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H929>animals<s%>.

And there shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6818>cry<s%> throughout all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, such as there was <S%H3808>none<s%> like <S%H3808>it<s%>, nor shall be like it any <S%H3254>more<s%>.

But against any of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall not a <S%H3611>dog<s%> <S%H2782>move<s%> his <S%H3956>tongue<s%>, against <S%H376>man<s%> or <S%H929>animal<s%>: that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> how that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> does put a <S%H6395>difference<s%> between the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And all these your <S%H5650>servants<s%> shall come <S%H3381>down<s%> unto <S%H7812>me<s%>, and bow down themselves unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying, Get you <S%H3318>out<s%>, and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H7272>follow<s%> you and <S%H310>after<s%> that I will go <S%H3318>out<s%>. And he went <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> in a <S%H2750>great<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> shall not <S%H8085>listen<s%> unto <S%H4159>you<s%>; that my wonders may be <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> all these <S%H4159>wonders<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>: and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2388>hardened<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart<s%>, so that he would not let the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> go <S%H7971>out<s%> of his <S%H776>land<s%>.
